scrape_metadata.notes: The Games & Toys collection metadata indicates products_count: 3, but the products.json API returns an empty array. This suggests the 3 products may be: (1) unpublished/draft status, (2) hidden from the storefront, or (3) have visibility restrictions that prevent public API access. The collection page at /collections/games-toys displays 'No products found' and '0 products'.
